alert.note: Alert for Hawkins; Northwest Carter; Northwest Greene; Southeast Carter; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Hawkins, Washington, northeastern Greene, northeastern Unicoi and Carter Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Hampton to 9 miles southeast of Surgoinsville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Central, Midway, Pine Crest, Gray and Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hawkins; Northwest Carter; Northwest Greene; Southeast Carter; Unicoi; Washington
